ygData.subject: RE: looking for info in Thicken Mana series
ygData.msgSnippet: they are for enchanting items. bascially right now they can be used to enchanting silk armour, eventually i think there will be more spells and more uses for
ygData.messageBody:
they are for enchanting items. bascially right now they can be used to
enchanting silk armour, eventually i think there will be more spells and
more uses for them in enchanting items.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, lazy 35th lvl enchanter on
Cazic-Thule
